predicate.note: Frames file for 'gut' based on sentences in wsj. No access to verbnet at the moment.

example.name: agent as pro
example.text: Oil and auto companies supported a move on Capitol Hill last week [*] to gut Mr. Bush's plans to require auto makers to begin selling alternative-fueled cars by 1995.
example.arg: Mr. Bush's plans to require auto makers to begin selling alternative-fueled cars by 1995
